casebody.data:
WALDEN
v.
MORGAN. No. 596P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 25, 2007. H. Brent Helms, for Biesecker Road Commercial. Paul A. Daniels, Greensboro, for Basyooni. The following order has been entered on the consent motion filed on the 4th day of December 2006 by Plaintiffs for Motion to Withdraw Notice of Appeal and Alternative Petition for Discretionary Review: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of January 2007." Justice HUDSON recused.
